sentences.en: Breathing hard from the sprint. Shoot again Repeat twice for duplicates.
sentences.cn: 跑得气喘吁吁,再拍一次,重复两次以便留底.

sentences.en: Gilles Delion, of France, won the Tour of Lombardy in a sprint finish at Monza yesterday.
sentences.cn: 法国选手吉勒斯·德利翁昨天在蒙扎凭借最后的冲刺获得伦巴第巡回赛冠军。

sentences.en: He had to sprint to catch the bus.
sentences.cn: 他得猛跑一阵才能赶上公共汽车.

sentences.en: He put on a sprint to catch the bus.
sentences.cn: 他全速奔跑以赶上公共汽车.
我开始飞快地跑了起来。

sentences.en: I knew there were other riders who could beat me in a sprint.
sentences.cn: 我知道还有其他骑手可能在短程赛马中打败我。

sentences.en: I won the fifty yard sprint.
Rob Harmeling won the sprint in Bordeaux.
sentences.cn: 罗布·哈梅林在波尔多获得短跑冠军。

sentences.en: Sergeant Horne sprinted to the car.
sentences.cn: 霍恩中士冲向那辆汽车。

sentences.en: Smith's sprint at the finish was really wonderful.
sentences.cn: 史密斯的终点冲刺确实是了不起.

sentences.en: The field were so close that they would have caught us if I hadn't begun the sprint.
sentences.cn: 其他参赛选手紧随身后，如果不是我开始冲刺，他们就会赶上我们了。

sentences.en: The police retreated at a sprint.
The runner seemed to be rallied for a final sprint.
sentences.cn: 这名赛跑者似乎在振作精神作最后的冲刺.

sentences.en: The Sprint Cup uses all these kinds of tracks.
sentences.cn: SPRINT杯赛,这些车道都会用到.

sentences.en: They hurtled across the line in a flat-out sprint.
sentences.cn: 他们拼命冲刺，越过终点线。

sentences.en: This paper researches how to program SPRINT algorithm by C ++.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了如何用C++语言实现SPRINT算法.

trans.tran_cn: 全速短跑，速度或活动的突然爆发
trans.tran_en: a short race in which the runners, riders, swimmers etc move very fast over a short distance
to run very fast for a short distance
